name: Canned Tuna With Beans and Red-Pepper Spread
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup roasted-red-pepper spread (or roasted piquillo peppers, drained and pulsed in the food processor with a little olive oil)
12 ounces fine tuna preserved in olive oil, preferably with paprika
1/2 cup marinated gigante beans or white beans

recipeInstructions.text: On each of 4 small plates, spread a 3-inch circle of the red-pepper spread. Place the tuna on top and spoon the beans around the tuna. Sprinkle with olive oil and aged sherry vinegar.
